title: Linn Sondek LP12, Naim Aro, Prefix etc FLAC
description:
Here is a collection of LP tracks and 12" 45 rpm transcribed from what was once a top of the line Linn Sondek LP12, fitted with the Cirkus, the Naim Armageddon power supply, the Naim Aro tonearm, a Lyra Helikon SL moving coil cartridge that was sent into a Naim Prefix built in MC phono stage that was powered by its own dedicated Naim Supercap supply. 

The audio feed from a Naim NAC552 preamp was sent into a Yamaha CD recorder using Kimber Select 1030 interconnect. All AC power was balanced via a 10kVA transformer. 

I also included a selection of tracks comparing the LP12 with a budget turntable purchased from eBay for $25, but also fitted with the same $2500 Lyra cartridge, but into a tube phono stage. Just for fun
